thread.title: 'Ke Lehi Tender' in post production phase
thread.title_full: 'Ke Lehi Tender' in post production phase - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 'Ke Lehi Tender' in post production phase
text:
Ke Lehi Tender is an upcoming Bhojpuri film made under the banner of Avinash production. It is a suspense action thriller film directed by Miraj Khan and produced by Dr. SD Gautam. The team also includes author Nanhey Pandey with melody singers Sudhakar Sharma, Pyarelal and Anuj Tiwari while the choreography has been done by Ashok, Mayank and Santosh Kumar.
The film Cast includes lead actors Viraj Bhatt and Navodita Madhuri Mishra besides Ayaj Khan, Sanjay Pandey, Manoj Tiger, Brijesh Tripathi, Rajkumar Shahi, Gopal Rai, Kokila Yadav, Shankar Dayal Gautam, Prerna Sharma, Gaffar Khan and item queen Seema Singh.
Ke Lehi Tender is about the situtation faced by the rural people when a Don Banka (Sanjay Pandey) rules the jungle. On the other hand, there is a good soul Harendra Singh (Dr. S.D Gautam) who is seen in an important role in the film. The story revolves around taking the government tender. Just to gain his own profit, corrupted 'Banka' creates serious complicated situations for the villagers.
In a twist, Dabbang personality inspector Karan Singh (Viraj Bhatt) enters the film, who fights against Banka's corruption. Not only this, he also tries to assemble all suspects against Banka. But who wins the race of getting the tender?
Source: Bhojpurimedia.com
